recipe.title: Butter Pie Crust
ingredients: 1 cup (2 sticks) chilled unsalted butter, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and salt in processor. Add butter; pulse until coarse meal forms. Gradually blend in enough ice water to form moist clumps. Gather dough into ball; divide in half. Form dough into 2 balls; flatten into disks. Wrap each in plastic; chill 2 hours or overnight.
